name: ESPNTheFan
0:
”Alexa, launch e. s. p. n. the fan.”
”Alexa, open e. s. p. n. the fan.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: e. s. p. n. the fan
des:
Utah's ESPN Radio Network
Once enabled, just say: "Alexa, open e. s. p. n. the fan" and Alexa will guide you from there!
After that, you can say things like:
 * "Listen to on demand"
 * "Resume"
 * "On demand options"
When playing audio, you can say:
 * Alexa, pause
When playing on-demand content, you can skip to an older show by saying:
 * Alexa, next
And navigate to the previous segment by saying:
 * Alexa, go back
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
